summary: The module defines a utility that builds a LangChain LLM chain with an OpenAI model and a prompt template, then runs the chain to obtain a text completion. It is used within a test application to showcase multi‑choice parameter handling via the Agenta framework.
business_intent: Demonstrate how to integrate an LLM‑based completion helper into an Agenta‑driven test app, enabling developers to experiment with configurable multi‑choice parameters for AI‑generated responses.
